entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 7:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
